statements: SELECT * FROM Entertainment;
SELECT title, genre FROM Entertainment;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Entertainment;
SELECT * FROM Entertainment WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Entertainment WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, genre FROM Entertainment WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT * FROM Entertainment WHERE genre = 'Action' AND release_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Entertainment WHERE title LIKE '%Star%';
SELECT * FROM Entertainment ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Entertainment;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM Entertainment;
SELECT MAX(release_date) FROM Entertainment;
SELECT MIN(id) FROM Entertainment;
SELECT title, YEAR(release_date) AS year FROM Entertainment;
SELECT genre, COUNT(*) FROM Entertainment GROUP BY genre;
SELECT genre, AVG(id) FROM Entertainment GROUP BY genre;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM Entertainment;
SELECT * FROM Entertainment LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Entertainment OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM Entertainment WHERE genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama');
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies;
SELECT id, title, genre, release_year FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT name, age FROM actors;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM actors;
SELECT m.title, m.release_year, a.name FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = a.id;
SELECT m.title, m.genre, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.genre = a.gender;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.gender FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.release_year < 2000;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.genre = 'Action';
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 1;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 2;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 3;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 4;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 5;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 6;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 7;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 8;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 9;
SELECT m.title, a.name, a.age FROM movies m JOIN actors a ON m.id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE release_year>2000;
SELECT id, title FROM Movies WHERE genre='Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM TVShows WHERE genre='Drama';
SELECT * FROM TVShows WHERE release_year>2010;
SELECT title, release_year FROM TVShows WHERE genre='Thriller';
SELECT * FROM TVShows WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE age>30;
SELECT name, age FROM Actors WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT title, genre, release_year FROM Movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM TVShows ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalMovies FROM Movies;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalTVShows FROM TVShows;
SELECT AVG(age) AS AverageAge FROM Actors;
SELECT MAX(release_year) AS MaxReleaseYear FROM Movies;
SELECT MIN(age) AS MinAge FROM Actors;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM Movies;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors;
SELECT dob, gender FROM actors;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT first_name, dob FROM directors;
SELECT * FROM movie_cast;
SELECT movie_id, actor_id, character_name FROM movie_cast;
SELECT title, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN actors ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id AND actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id;

SELECT title, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN actors ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id AND actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id;
SELECT title, genre, actor_id, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id;
SELECT title, genre, actor_id, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id;
SELECT title, genre, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id;

SELECT title, genre, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id INNER JOIN directors ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id;

SELECT title, genre, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id INNER JOIN directors ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id INNER JOIN actors ON directors.director_id = directors.actor_id;

SELECT title, genre, first_name, last_name, character_name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON actors.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id INNER JOIN directors ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id INNER JOIN actors ON directors.director_id = directors.actor_id WHERE title LIKE '%Action%';
